document.full_text: more than 80 rebels were killed in clashes with the army in south sudan, a government minister said wednesday in the latest violence to mar preparations for the region's independence.
document.title: more than 80 rebels killed in south sudan: minister
lines_and_colors: more than 80 rebels were killed in clashes with the army in south sudan, a government minister said wednesday in the latest violence to mar preparations for the region's independence.
